message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.IT. 

This paper discusses the fundamental attack against blockchain systems, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also involves mathematical modeling and analysis, which could be categorized under distributed computing (cs.DC) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Additionally, game theory (cs.GT) is used to analyze the probability of success of the double-spend attack. Information theory (cs.IT) is also relevant as it involves the analysis of information flow in the blockchain system.
